name: Crypto Market Alerts
description:
Get changes in the crypto market and receive alerts when you want them!

BrowserAct makes it easy to get the changes in crypto when you want them. Everything is saved in Make!

Choose your alerts in your own words using ChatGPT. There's no need for code or formulas to build your report.

Get alerts on your schedule, right to Slack!

This template was created by Reid Mosieur.
